name: lighthouse-ci
description: Automate running Lighthouse for every commit, viewing the changes, and preventing regressions
helpMarkDown: Automate running Lighthouse for every commit, viewing the changes, and preventing regressions. Read more about [LightHouse CI](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse-ci)
author: @Gurucharan94

inputs.name: targetArtifactPath
inputs.label: Artifact to infer Build Context
inputs.helpMarkDown:
In a release pipeline, point to the root folder of the artifact which can be used to infer [build context](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/lighthouse-ci/blob/master/docs/cli.md#build-context). If no value is specified, context is inferred from the primary artifact of the pipeline.

In a build / YAML multi stage pipeline, the context is inferred automatically and this field is ignored.

inputs.name: configFilePath
inputs.label: LHCI Configuration File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the lighthouse CI configuration file. Input to --config option of LHCI

inputs.name: failOnStderr
inputs.label: Fail on Standard Error
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is checked, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream
